allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Trading Card Game App

A full-stack trading card application with real-time battle system.

Features:
- Daily card distribution system
- Card collection and marketplace
- Gift and trade system with friends
- Real-time card battles with WebSocket
- Attack/defense card mechanics
- Dark mode support
- Epic fantasy-themed UI

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS
- Backend: NestJS + TypeORM + PostgreSQL
- Real-time: Socket.IO
- Containerization: Docker + Docker Compose
